Container.Name: n8n
Container.Overview:
n8n (pronounced n-eight-n) helps you to interconnect every app with an API in the world with each other to share and manipulate its data without a single line of code. It is an easy to use, user-friendly and highly customizable service, which uses an intuitive user interface for you to design your unique workflows very fast. Hosted on your server and not based in the cloud, it keeps your sensible data very secure in your own trusted database.
[br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br]
[b]Config[/b] : Storing n8n config and SQL Lite db for your personal workflows.[br] [b]Timezone[/b] : (Optional) Required for scheduling to know what time zone the workflows should be started. See https://momentjs.com/timezone/ to find your timezone string.[br] [b]Webhook Tunnel[/b]: (Optional) Set the webhook URL manually to correctly display in Editor UI and for it to get registered correctly with external services. Must have trailing slash. (e.g.'http://192.168.1.161:5678/')[br]
Container.Changes:
Updated for n8n 1.x compatibility:
- Changed home directory to `/home/node/.n8n` - Renamed webhook tunnel variable to `WEBHOOK_TUNNEL` - Dropped basic auth config since it's deprecated in n8n 1.x
Container.Description:
n8n (pronounced n-eight-n) helps you to interconnect every app with an API in the world with each other to share and manipulate its data without a single line of code. [b]Config[/b] : Storing n8n config and SQL Lite db for your personal workflows.[br] [b]Timezone[/b] : (Optional) Required for scheduling to know what time zone the workflows should be started. Must have trailing slash. (e.g.'http://192.168.1.161:5678/')[br]

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Required for scheduling to know what time zone the workflows should be started. See https://momentjs.com/timezone/ to find your timezone string.

Config.Name: Config
Config.Description: Where to save config and SQL Lite Database which holds your workflows.

Config.Name: Webhook Tunnel
Config.Description: Set the webhook URL manually to correctly display in Editor UI and for it to get registered correctly with external services. Must have trailing slash. (e.g.'http://192.168.1.161:5678/')
